title: Businessweek Talks with Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks with Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins
description:
Chuck Robbins, Chief Executive Officer at Cisco Systems, sits down with Carol Massar and Jason Kelly to discuss trade tariffs, the Huawei ban and the roll out of 5G. Robbins also talks about his management style and the best business advice he's ever been given. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.  Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
